attributes.action: Stop the BBC seling off the iconic TV Centre in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC has announced massive job cuts and a retructure.  Part of this includes closing and selling off BBC TV Centre in Wood Lane, West London.

This famous building has been the home of the BBC for over 50 years and has been has also been home for many iconic programmes such as Blue Peter, Blackadder and Strictly Come Dancing.

We must stop this from happening.  If TV Centre goes we have lost part of our Television heritage.

It may not be world hunger or Early General Elections but it is worth fighting for.

Add your name and force the BBC to change their decision!

**SAVE BBC TELEVISION CENTRE**

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
